title: The Time-Travelling Sandwich Bites Back
description: Compton Vallance has an incredible secret: he can travel through time using a stinky sandwich. And now he's in big trouble! His evil brother Bravo has stolen the sandwich and is biting his way through time, causing chaos. It's up to Compton and his bungling mate Bryan to stop Bravo before time runs out and the universe implodes.
author: Matt   Brown
